title: Aleksandra：MCPE Alpha 0.9.0 build 1 已知BUG
author: kaho
txt_content:
本帖最后由 kaho 于 2014-6-10 20:47 编辑 

原文
 
BUILD 1
Some issues that have been reported since Beta was released. Please do not post those bugs again. 

Known Bugs:
Edit:
- Durability bar on tools is displayed in the middle of the icon
- Sky changes color when underwater or after respawn
- Glass texture issues
- High spawn rate of mobs at night
- Door issues
- Flat world rendering issues
- Red sand turning into normal sand
- No sounds from mobs
- Swimming slimes
- Endermen bugs
- Various blocks (snow, grass, trees) being rendered sideways.
- No Villager egg
- Mining new blocks gives you cobblestone. 
Edit

- The block highlight flickers (z-fights) when more than 10k blocks distant from spawn.
- Changing the view distance while in a world might crash the game.
- If players walk too far from each other in multiplayer, they can't see each other anymore.


Known bugs requiring attention:

- Multiplayer is a bit fragile. Please test it and report all issues to us!
- The LevelDB save format + upgrading of old maps. Please report any data corruption!
- Crashes in general - uncommon and random crashes might still happen.?



翻译【少数地方将有不准确的翻译，不确定的翻译将保留原文】
 
BUILD 1
以下的BUG已经在测试版【Beta】里发现并且汇报。请不要再【向我们】汇报这些BUG

已知BUG：
更新：
- 耐久性条会显示在工具图标的中间
- 当在水下重生，天空会变成其他的颜色
- 玻璃材质的问题
- 在夜间，小怪的刷怪率提高
- 门的问题
- 平坦的世界呈现的问题
- 红沙会变成正常的沙
- 怪物没有声音
- 游泳的史莱姆
- 终界使者【安得】的漏洞
- 各种块（雪，草，树）被渲染斜向一边的
- 没有村民的蛋
- 挖掘新的方块会给你鹅卵石
更新

- The block highlight flickers (z-fights) when more than 10k blocks distant from spawn.
- 改变视角会导致游戏崩溃
- 在多人游戏，如果玩家彼此走太远，他们将永远无法看到对方【见面】

值得关注的已知bug：
- 多人游戏会有一点不稳定【很脆弱】。请测试并报告所有的问题给我们！
- LevelDB保存格式+旧地图的升级。请报告任何数据损坏【的问题】！
- 通常崩溃 - 少见【的崩溃】、随机【的崩溃】仍然有机会会发生！


以上为官方公布的BUG列表。如您发现BUG又不在列表上显示，请您回复。我会帮你转交给MOJANG官方。
